item.title: Unveiling the intricate nyonya needlework at the Peranakan Museum in Singapore
item.description:
This image, from the Peranakan Museum website, shows an example of Nyonya needlework. The “Nyonya Needlework: Embroidery and Beadwork in the Peranakan World” exhibition is currently on display at the Peranakan Museum in Singapore until March 26, 2017. This exhibition showcases the artistry of Nyonya needlework, a significant aspect of Peranakan Chinese culture. Elaborate curtains, wall hangings, delicate purses, handkerchiefs, and slippers are meticulously crafted with tiny beads, silk, gold, and silver threads...

item.description:
Indulge in Peranakan sweets with the “Pay 1 Dine 2 Afternoon High Tea” at Hari’s Bar Lobby & Lounge.
